mapper.sql:
SELECT post_no, cafe_url, board_no, board_name, member_no, member_nickname, post_title,
TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS reg_date, view_count, like_count, post_status_flag, post_notice_flag, notice_index FROM post WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} AND post.post_status_flag = '0' ORDER BY reg_date DESC

SELECT reply_no, post_no, member_no, member_nickname, reply_content, TO_CHAR(reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS reg_date, like_count, reply_status_flag FROM reply WHERE post_no = #{postNo} AND target_reply_no IS NULL ORDER BY reply_no
mapper.select:
SELECT post.post_no, post.board_no, post.member_no, post.post_title, post.post_content, TO_CHAR(post.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS reg_date, post.view_count, post.like_count, post.member_nickname, post.post_status_flag, post.post_notice_flag, post.notice_index, post.cafe_url FROM post, board
post.board_no = board.board_no AND post.cafe_url = #{cafeURL} AND board.board_type = 'cb100' AND post.post_status_flag = '0'
ORDER BY reg_date DESC

INSERT INTO post ( post_no, post_title, board_no, board_name, member_no, cafe_url, post_content, reg_date, member_nickname, post_notice_flag) VALUES ( SEQ_POST_POST_NO.NEXTVAL, #{postTitle}, #{boardNo}, #{boardName}, #{memberNo}, #{cafeURL}, #{postContent}, SYSDATE, #{memberNickname}, #{postNoticeFlag})
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET post_title = #{postTitle}, board_no = #{boardNo}, board_name = #{boardName}, post_content = #{postContent}, post_notice_flag = #{postNoticeFlag} WHERE post_no = #{postNo}
UPDATE post SET post_status_flag = '1' WHERE post_no = #{postNo}
UPDATE post SET post_status_flag = '1' WHERE post_no IN (${value})

SELECT reply_no, post_no, member_no, member_nickname, reply_content, TO_CHAR(reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS reg_date, like_count, reply_status_flag FROM reply WHERE reply_no = #{replyNo}

mapper.select: SELECT news.cafe_name, news.cafe_url, news.cafe_icon, news.post_no, news.board_name, news.post_title, news.post_content, news.member_nickname, news.reg_date FROM (SELECT c.cafe_name, c.cafe_icon, p.cafe_url, p.post_no, p.board_name, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.member_nickname, TO_CHAR(p.reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS reg_date FROM cafe c, post p WHERE c.url=p.cafe_url AND p.post_status_flag='0' AND cafe_url in( SELECT c.url FROM cafe c, cafe_member m WHERE c.cafe_no=m.cafe_no AND c.closed_flag='0' AND m.user_no = #{userNo} AND m.member_status_code in ('cs100') ) ORDER BY p.reg_date DESC) news WHERE rownum < 11
